title: Mohamed Boubekeur
text: Mohamed Boubekeur (born 1941) is a Moroccan <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201960%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20welterweight">men's light welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1960%20Summer%20Olympics">1960 Summer Olympics</a>.
